UVA Problems

Above Average


	
#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>



using namespace std;



int main(){
	int n, m, in;



cin >> n;

for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){
	cin >> m;
	int arr[m];
	double ave = 0;
	double percent = 0;

	for(int j = 0; j < m; j++){
		cin >> in;
		arr[j] = in;
		ave += in;
	}

	
	ave = ave/m;

	// cout << ave << endl;


	
	for(int j = 0; j < m; j++){
		if(arr[j] > ave){
			percent++;
		}
	}

	percent = percent/m;

	printf("%.3f%%\n", percent * 100);
	
	


}



return 0; 




}
